3822980.headline: VICI Properties Reports Q1 FFO Per Share Of $0.33
3822980.description: May 3 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS.SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.39 TO $1.41.Q1 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.36.Q1 FFO PER SHARE $0.33.Q1 REVENUE $218.3 MILLION VERSUS I\/B\/E\/S VIEW $216.2 MILLION.Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.32 -- THOMSON REUTERS I\/B\/E\/S.

3851990.headline: VICI Says Penn National And\/Or Co To Pay Termination Fee Of $12.5 Mln If Deal Terminated
3851990.description: June 19 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::VICI - IF DEAL TERMINATED UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, PENN NATIONAL AND\/OR CO TO PAY TERMINATION FEE OF $12.5 MILLION, WHICH MAY INCREASE TO UP TO $20 MILLION.

3878519.headline: Vici Properties Reports Q2 FFO Per Share $0.38
3878519.description: Aug 2 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2018 RESULTS.Q2 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.35.Q2 FFO PER SHARE $0.38.Q2 REVENUE $221 MILLION VERSUS I\/B\/E\/S VIEW $219.8 MILLION.SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.43 TO $1.44.INCREASES GUIDANCE FOR FULL-YEAR 2018.SEES 2018 EPS OF  $ 1.48 - $ 1.49.FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.53 -- THOMSON REUTERS I\/B\/E\/S.FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.51 -- THOMSON REUTERS I\/B\/E\/S.

3928583.headline: Vici Properties Q3 Adjusted FFO Per Share $0.36
3928583.description: Nov 1 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2018 RESULTS.Q3 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.36.Q3 FFO PER SHARE $0.35.Q3 REVENUE $232.7 MILLION VERSUS I\/B\/E\/S VIEW $230.9 MILLION.SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.43 TO $1.44.SEES 2018 ESTIMATED FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS (FFO) PER DILUTED SHARE $1.44 TO $1.45.SEES 2018 ESTIMATED NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS PER DILUTED SHARE $1.44 TO $1.45.

3982132.headline: VICI Properties Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $0.36
3982132.description: Feb 14 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2018 RESULTS.SEES FY 2019 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.47 TO $1.50.Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.36.Q4 REVENUE $226 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $233.6 MILLION.Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.37.ESTABLISHES GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2019.VICI PROPERTIES SEES NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS FOR YEAR ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2019 WILL BE BETWEEN $1.45 AND $1.48 PER DILUTED SHARE.SEES 2019 AFFO PER SHARE BETWEEN $1.47 AND $1.50.FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.63, REVENUE VIEW $1.02 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4026075.headline: Vici Properties Inc. Announces First Quarter 2019 Results
4026075.description: May 1 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2019 RESULTS.SEES FY 2019 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.47 TO $1.50.Q1 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.37.Q1 REVENUE $214 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $224.7 MILLION.Q1 FFO PER SHARE $0.37.REAFFIRMS GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2019.

4053543.headline: Vici Properties Announces Public Offering Of Common Stock
4053543.description: June 24 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::VICI PROPERTIES INC. ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK.VICI PROPERTIES INC SAYS HAS COMMENCED AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 90.0 MILLION SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK.VICI PROPERTIES - TO ISSUE AND SELL 30 MILLION SHARES DIRECTLY TO UNDERWRITERS AT CLOSING AND UNDERWRITERS WILL BUY 60 MILLION SHARES RELATED TO FORWARD SALE AGREEMENTS.VICI PROPERTIES INC SAYS EXPECTS TO USE ANY CASH PROCEEDS FROM FORWARD SALE AGREEMENTS TO FUND PORTION OF RECENTLY ANNOUNCED DEAL WITH ELDORADO RESORTS.

4071794.headline: Vici Properties Reports Q2 Adj FFO Per Share Of $0.38
4071794.description: July 31 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2019 RESULTS.Q2 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.38.Q2 REVENUE $220.7 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $217.2 MILLION.SEES FY 2019 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.45 TO $1.47.Q2 FFO PER SHARE $0.37.FY2019 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.47 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.UPDATES GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2019.SEES FY FFO PER SHARE $1.38 - $1.40.

4117957.headline: VICI Properties Posts Q3 Adj FFO\/Shr Of $0.35
4117957.description: Oct 31 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2019 RESULTS.Q3 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.35.Q3 REVENUE $222.5 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $224 MILLION.SEES FY 2019 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.47 TO $1.48.Q3 FFO PER SHARE $0.31.ESTIMATES NET INCOME FOR FY WILL BE BETWEEN $1.37 AND $1.38 PER DILUTED SHARE.ESTIMATES AFFO FOR FY WILL BE BETWEEN $1.47 AND $1.48 PER DILUTED SHARE.

4171467.headline: Vici Properties Announces Fourth Quarter And Full Year 2019 Results
4171467.description: Feb 20 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2019 RESULTS.Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.37.Q4 REVENUE $237.5 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $235.3 MILLION.SEES FY 2020 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.50 TO $1.54.Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.21.VICI PROPERTIES - ESTIMATES THAT NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS FOR YEAR WILL BE BETWEEN $1.30 AND $1.35 PER DILUTED SHARE.ESTIMATES AFFO FOR YEAR WILL BE BETWEEN $1.50 AND $1.54 PER DILUTED SHARE.SEES FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS (FFO) PER DILUTED SHARE OF BETWEEN $1.30 - $1.35 FOR 2020.FY2020 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.67, REVENUE VIEW $1.17 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.FY2020 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.66 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4226593.headline: Vici Properties Says Collected 100% Of Rent In May
4226593.description: June 1 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::VICI PROPERTIES INC - COLLECTS 100% OF RENT IN MAY.VICI PROPERTIES INC - INITIATES SETTLEMENT OF $1.3 BILLION FORWARD SALE AGREEMENTS.VICI PROPERTIES INC - AGREES WITH CAESARS TO TEMPORARILY MODIFY CERTAIN CAPITAL EXPENDITURE REQUIREMENTS.VICI PROPERTIES INC - ANTICIPATES COLLECTING ALL RENT DUE FOR MONTH OF JUNE.VICI PROPERTIES INC - EXPECTS TO DELIVER TO FORWARD PURCHASERS 65 MILLION SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK TO EFFECT SETTLEMENT.VICI PROPERTIES - AMENDMENT PROVIDES CAESARS WITH SOME RELIEF WITH RESPECT TO PORTION OF THEIR CAPEX OBLIGATIONS UNDER LEASES.VICI PROPERTIES INC - IN MAY 2020, AMENDED TRIPLE NET LEASE AGREEMENT WITH CENTURY CASINOS.VICI PROPERTIES INC - AGREED TO WAIVE CENTURY'S CAPITAL EXPENDITURE REQUIREMENTS FOR 2020.

4251810.headline: VICI Properties Q2 FFO Per Share $0.47
4251810.description: July 29 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2020 RESULTS.Q2 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.36.Q2 FFO PER SHARE $0.47.Q2 REVENUE $257.9 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $255.8 MILLION.QTRLY NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS $0.47 PER SHARE.DECLARED A QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.2975 PER SHARE, A 3.5% YEAR-OVER-YEAR INCREASE.Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.Q2 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.37 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4345990.headline: Vici Properties Inc Reports Q4 Ajusted FFO Per Share $0.46
4345990.description: Feb 18 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2020 RESULTS.Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.46.Q4 FFO PER SHARE $0.53.Q4 REVENUE $373 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $352.3 MILLION.SEES FY 2021 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.87.FY2021 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.86 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4381307.headline: VICI Properties Reports Q1 Adjusted FFO Per Share Of $0.47
4381307.description: April 29 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2021 RESULTS.Q1 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.47.Q1 FFO PER SHARE $0.50.Q1 REVENUE ROSE 46.8 PERCENT TO $374.3 MILLION.SEES FY ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.87.SAYS REAFFIRMS GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2021.Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.47 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.SEES FY 2021 AFFO EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.82 - $1.87.FY2021 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.84 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.

4420981.headline: Vici Properties Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2021 Results
4420981.description: July 28 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2021 RESULTS.Q2 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.46.Q2 FFO PER SHARE $0.54.Q2 REVENUE $376.4 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $368.6 MILLION.SEES FY ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.82 TO $1.87.

4460309.headline: Vici Properties Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2021 Results
4460309.description: Oct 27 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::VICI PROPERTIES INC ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2021 RESULTS.Q3 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.45.Q3 REVENUE ROSE 10.6 PERCENT TO $375.7 MILLION.SEES FY ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.79 TO $1.80.Q3 FFO PER SHARE $0.28.

4510284.headline: Vici Properties Announces Q4 And Full Year 2021 Results
4510284.description: Feb 23 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2021 RESULTS.Q4 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.44.Q4 REVENUE ROSE 2.7 PERCENT TO $383.2 MILLION.SEES FY ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $1.80 TO $1.84.ESTIMATES AFFO FOR YEAR ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2022 WILL BE BETWEEN $1.80 AND $1.84 PER DILUTED SHARE.

4572601.headline: VICI Properties Announces Second Quarter 2022 Results
4572601.description: July 27 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2022 RESULTS.Q2 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.48.Q2 FFO LOSS PER SHARE $0.06.Q2 REVENUE ROSE 76 PERCENT TO $662.6 MILLION.REAFFIRMING AFFO GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR.

4613597.headline: VICI Properties Announces Q3 FFO Per Share Of $0.35
4613597.description: Oct 27 (Reuters) - Vici Properties Inc <VICI.N>::ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2022 RESULTS.Q3 FFO PER SHARE $0.35.Q3 REVENUE ROSE 100 PERCENT TO $751.5 MILLION.Q3 ADJUSTED FFO PER SHARE $0.49.QTRLY FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS WAS $340.6 MILLION, OR $0.35 PER SHARE.Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.57, REVENUE VIEW $740.7 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.SEES FULL YEAR 2022 AFFO TO BE BETWEEN $1,682.0 MILLION AND $1,692.0 MILLION, OR BETWEEN $1.91 AND $1.92 PER DILUTED COMMON SHARE.

4699996.headline: VICI Properties Reports Net Income Attributable To Common Stockholders For Quarter Of $0.52 Per Share
4699996.description: May 1 (Reuters) - VICI Properties Inc <VICI.N>::ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2023 RESULTS.NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS FOR QUARTER $0.52 PER SHARE.FFO ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS FOR QUARTER $0.52 PER SHARE.AFFO PER SHARE WAS $0.53 FOR QUARTER.SEES FY 2023 ESTIMATED ADJUSTED FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS PER DILUTED SHARE $2.10 TO $2.13.FY2023 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $2.19 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA.
